column8: Reduced coupling activity mainly between SN and other sensory and cognitive networks
Decreasing hub organization in associative and SMN networks
Weakened connections within ventral attention centers and frontal areas
Weakened connections within frontostriatal network and stronger in ventral attention and parietal areas
Increase connectivity in anterior/frontal and decreased in posterior
Decreased cerebellum and subcortical and increased frontotemporal ReHo
